alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 16 at 3:15AM MST until November 17 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From Late Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated snow showers could produce patchy blowing snow as well.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
